General.Name: Scandic Hotels Group AB
General.Description: Scandic Hotels Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, engages in operation and franchising of hotels in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, Germany, Poland, and other European Countries. It operates hotels under the Scandic, Hilton, Holiday Inn, and Crowne Plaza brands. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
